thread.title: Is Rediff-WPP a done deal?
thread.title_full: Is Rediff-WPP a done deal? | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

title: Is Rediff-WPP a done deal?
text:
British marketing services giant WPP has acquired a majority stake in leading Indian advertising agency network Rediffusion Y&R, according to unconfirmed sources.
WPP, which owns a 26.67% stake in Rediffusion via its Young & Rubicam network, is said to have bought out the 60% held by Arun Nanda and Ajit Balakrishnan. The balance 13.33% in Rediff is held by Dentsu.
WPP has been in talks with Mr Nanda since around 2002 to buy the stake but there was no agreement on the price.
